summary: This is an email chain from September 2021 regarding scheduling a conference call between FBI Victim Services personnel and Maxwell case agents to discuss retrieving emails and texts related to victim discovery in the Epstein & Maxwell case. The email shows coordination efforts within the FBI's victim support division.

persons.name: Program Manager
persons.role: Program Manager, Victim Program Management Unit
persons.context: Schedules a conference call regarding victim discovery in the Epstein & Maxwell case, working within the FBI Victim Services Division.

persons.name: Victim Specialist
persons.context: Initiates contact to arrange a conference call with Maxwell case agents to discuss retrieving emails and texts for victim discovery.

connections.description: Both are FBI personnel coordinating on victim discovery efforts related to the Epstein & Maxwell case.

events.title: Scheduling of victim discovery conference call
events.description: Email coordination to schedule a conference call between FBI Victim Services and Maxwell case agents to discuss retrieving emails and texts for victim discovery.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division was actively working on victim discovery in the Epstein & Maxwell case as of September 2021.
The coordination involved retrieving emails and texts, indicating digital evidence collection was ongoing.
The email chain shows internal FBI communication regarding case management and victim support efforts.
The document references 'Maxwell case agents,' indicating active investigation into Ghislaine Maxwell's case at that time.
